Welcome to Kiera. Designed to help you perform common SharePoint actions quickly and easily. Generally we recommend talking to Kiera as naturally as possible - if at any point you want to cancel what you are doing, or Kiera gets confused, type "exit".

If you have any comments or suggestions then we're always happy to hear from you via the Feedback button at the top right.

Topics

Kiera is a SharePoint Bot and here are the areas s/he can help out with.

External Accounts

An external account is one that can be used by non-Kier employees to access Kier SharePoint. The external person will be sent a username and password to log onto the system. You will then be able to manage thier access in the same way as you currently manage other users. There accounts can opnly be used to access SharePoint sites with https://ext.kier.co.uk or https://ext.kier.group at the beginning of the URL.

Try asking Kiera to create an account to get started.

User Permissions

I can add and remove users from groups on your SharePoint sites.

Try entering "add user to group" to get started.

SharePoint Site Creation

I can create SharePoint sites.

Try entering "create site" to get started.

Knowledge Base

I can answer questions related to SharePoint and Change Management.

Try asking "What is SharePoint?"

Harmon.ie

I can deploy the Harmon.ie Outlook plug in to computers on the Kier domain.

Try entering "deploy Harmon.ie to a machine"
